title: Salahmu
author: Salahmu
created_time: August 08, 2023, 11:22:58 AMLast edit: August 08, 2023, 02:52:37 PM by Salahmu
content: Actually I can't help but wonder how crypto awareness would have spread if there was no forum like this, though I have not really gain anything financially from this forum yet but the level of crypto knowledge that has been impacting on me on a daily basis is actually helpful, I came to this forum with no idea about crypto and how it works but now I was able to read and learn from this forum and through the experience people in this forum I was able to learn many things, so I always see this forum as a place of learning as such the forum impact you the knowledge to navigate other ways that will help you earn a living through internet. And the good thing is that through the forum most people were able to earn some money through Campaigns, so tell me what platform would have been more better than this forum? I no so many persons has other major sources of income aside from this forum while some persons depends on the forum to earn a living, so tell me if there was no forum like this how things would have been for you?, I love learning so I'm always here to learn so please share your knowledge and views.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: the view a person comes to a forum to make money will influence how he or she will participate in the forum. focus and just follow the discussion. even though when we take part in a signature campaign, we are obliged to fulfill some posting quotas. it might affect our time online in forums. however if you are oriented towards making forums a source of income, there could be a lot of work pressure on you. and you will not be free to do what you want.but your view on this I believe is also rational. there are some of them who are in the forums for earning. and that's what makes them last longer in the forum. although we can't assume all the members are of the same mind.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Salahmu on August 08, 2023, 11:22:58 AMthough I have not really gain anything financially from this forum yet but the level of crypto knowledge that has been impacting on me on a daily basis is actually helpfulKnowledge is more valuable than money. Imagine making $100 a week but not knowing a single principle about Bitcoin or even how the network works. That would be a loss for that person, because they will just run to greener pastures once the signature campaigns are no longer viable for whatever reason.But learning about Bitcoin is helpful, because that enables you to actually make use of it (and not lose it).

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: Salahmu on August 08, 2023, 11:22:58 AMAnd the good thing is that through the forum most people were able to earn some money through Campaigns, so tell me what platform would have been more better than this forum? After writing too long, it comes to the end about earnings through signature campaigns. You can join signature campaigns only if you are a good quality poster and can contribute good posts to advertise those companies with your posts that carry their signatures.If you have yet been quality poster and have enough contributions, you will not be competitive enough and your application will not be accepted. comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Leaving aside the fact that the issue of campaigns has been alluded by the OP and other members who have written before me, the fact that if it wasn't for that reason this thread might not even exist, and the not so hidden reason that this answer of mine is in part also motivated by that reason (blame on me), I can't imagine the Internet without the oasis of calm this forum represents, amidst the noise of social media and influencers where lies prevail for a few bucks or, worse, likes.I have grown up here, I've learnt the fundamentals of everything related to crypto nowhere but here, I have made friends and, yes, I have earned some money too. So, if I had to imagine a life without this forum, rest assured that it would not be a so fulfilling one in comparison.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: The Bitcointalk forum serves as a school for anyone who wants to learn about Cryptocurrency, many people who come here have gone from not understanding anything about Cryptocurrency to becoming reliable crypto actors both in terms of trading and investing. Previously, have you ever imagined being able to make money while studying, you can get both in this forum.People who join here come from various countries with different activity backgrounds, besides getting a regular income from real life activities, they have also managed to increase the amount of income from the forum. As long as you are consistent in the forum by learning what has been distributed here, you will get something valuable in the forum.

It is true that, thanks to the forum, many users can support their lives by earning, which the forum offers as a privilege.
